data.description: Join our advanced analytics team to turn data into actionable insights that drive business decisions. In this role, you’ll partner with stakeholders, explore customer purchasing patterns, and build predictive models using internal and external data. You’ll craft compelling visualizations, compare approaches, and communicate recommendations clearly to both technical and non-technical audiences. We’re looking for someone passionate about data wrangling, machine learning, and emerging AI trends—comfortable with ambiguity and eager to learn in a dynamic, global environment.
